xataio/pgstream

Postgres replication tool handling schema and data changes, streams to various outputs

Related repos

  • Manages PostgreSQL schema migrations
  • Fast Postgres data streaming with CDC
  • Real-time data replication between databases
  • Streams Postgres changes to destinations using Rust
  • Database client for PostgreSQL, MariaDB, and SQLite
